posts.author: nostalgicsamurai
posts.content:
I am looking for a PvM unarmed build with at least 14 points in charisma 13 in intelligence and 14 in strength. It should have at least one classe that benefits from the high charisma it should have decent (at the very least) melee abilities, and it should be good aligned.
It can use the PRC pak. Sneak abilities are appreciated.
